SELECT R, ITEM_NUM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_VIEWS_NO, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_URL FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS R, ITEM_NUM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_VIEWS_NO, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_URL FROM(SELECT ITEM_NUM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_VIEWS_NO, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_URL FROM OPT_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ENABLED = 'Y' ORDER BY ITEM_NUM_SEQ DESC)) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

ITEM_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%'
ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%' or ITEM_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%'
ORDER BY ITEM_NUM_SEQ DESC
